original: “Bhante nāgasena, ‘cakkavattissa cattāri aṅgāni gahetabbānī’ti yaṁ vadesi, katamāni tāni cattāri aṅgāni gahetabbānī”ti?
analyzed: bhante nāgasena cakkavattissa cattāri aṅgāni gahetabbāni iti yam vadesi katamāni tāni cattāri aṅgāni gahetabbāni iti

original: “Yathā, mahārāja, cakkavattī catūhi saṅgahavatthūhi janaṁ saṅgaṇhāti;
analyzed: yathā mahā rāja cakkavattī catūhi saṅgaha vatthūhi janam saṅgaṇhāti

original: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena catassannaṁ parisānaṁ mānasaṁ saṅgahetabbaṁ anuggahetabbaṁ sampahaṁsetabbaṁ.
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja yoginā yogāvacarena catassannam parisānam mānasam saṅgahetabbam anuggahetabbam sampahasetabba

original: Idaṁ, mahārāja, cakkavattissa paṭhamaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabbaṁ.
analyzed: idam mahā rāja cakkavattissa paṭhamam aṅgam

original: Puna caparaṁ, mahārāja, cakkavattissa vijite corā na uṭṭhahanti;
analyzed: puna capara mahā rāja cakkavattissa vijite corāḥ na uṭṭhahanti

original: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena kāmarāgabyāpādavihiṁsāvitakkā na uppādetabbā.
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja yoginā yogāvacarena kāma rāga byāpāda vihisā vitakkā na uppādetabbā

original: Idaṁ, mahārāja, cakkavattissa dutiyaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabbaṁ.
analyzed: idam mahā rāja cakkavattissa dutiyam aṅgam gahetabba

original: Puna caparaṁ, mahārāja, cakkavattī divase divase samuddapariyantaṁ mahāpathaviṁ anuyāyati kalyāṇapāpakāni vicinamāno;
analyzed: puna capara mahā rāja cakkavattī divase divase samudda pariyantam mahā pathavim anuyāyati kalyāṇa pāpakāni vicinamānaḥ

original: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena kāyakammaṁ vacīkammaṁ manokammaṁ divase divase paccavekkhitabbaṁ ‘kiṁ nu kho me imehi tīhi ṭhānehi anupavajjassa divaso vītivattatī’ti.
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja yoginā yogāvacarena kāya kammam vacī kammam manaḥ kammam divase divase paccavekkhitabbam kim nu kho me imehi tīhi ṭhānehi anupavajjassa divasaḥ vītivattati iti

original: Idaṁ, mahārāja, cakkavattissa tatiyaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabbaṁ.
analyzed: idam mahā rāja cakkavattissa tatiyam aṅgam gahetabba
mahā rāja bhagavatā devātidevena aṅguttara nikāya vare

original: ‘Kathambhūtassa me rattindivā vītivattantīti pabbajitena abhiṇhaṁ paccavekkhitabban’ti.
analyzed: kathambhūtassa me rattindivā vītivattanti iti pabbajitena abhiṇham paccavekkhitabbanti

original: Puna caparaṁ, mahārāja, cakkavattissa abbhantarabāhirārakkhā susaṁvihitā hoti;
analyzed: puna capara mahā rāja cakkavattissa abbhantara bāhira ārakkhā su sa vihitā hoti

original: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena abbhantarānaṁ bāhirānaṁ kilesānaṁ ārakkhāya satidovāriko ṭhapetabbo.
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja yoginā yogāvacarena abbhantarānam bāhirānam kilesānam ārakkhāya sati dovārikaḥ ṭhapetabbo

original: Idaṁ, mahārāja, cakkavattissa catutthaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabbaṁ.
analyzed: idam mahā rāja cakkavattissa catuttham aṅgam

original: ‘Satidovāriko, bhikkhave, ariyasāvako akusalaṁ pajahati kusalaṁ bhāveti, sāvajjaṁ pajahati, anavajjaṁ bhāveti, suddhamattānaṁ pariharatī’”ti.
analyzed: satidovārikaḥ bhikkhave ariyasāvakaḥ akusalam pajahati kusalam bhāveti sāvajjam pajahati anavajjam bhāveti suddham attānam pariharati iti
